summary: Completed testing of Passages de Grades (FFAAA Grade Program) feature. Backend API: 12/12 tests PASSED. Frontend: All features working correctly - grade list, grade detail view, techniques, mouvements, and navigation.
critical_code_review_comments: PassagesGradesViewer component properly uses data-testid attributes for testing
API correctly returns 6 Kyu grades with all required fields
Grade detail view shows techniques grouped by attack type and category
Frontend correctly fetches data from REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL environment variable
seed_data_creation: None - uses static PROGRAMME_FFAAA data from backend models
context_for_next_testing_agent: Passages de Grades feature fully tested. Backend API at /api/grades/programme returns 6 Kyu grades. Frontend component PassagesGradesViewer accessible via Admin > Espace de gestion (password: aikido2024) > Sports > Aikido > Passages de Grades. All grade cards have data-testid='grade-card-{grade_id}' attributes.

GET /api/grades/programme.details: Returns list of 6 Kyu grades with correct fields (id, nom, nom_japonais, couleur_ceinture, delai_minimum, heures_minimum, nb_techniques, nb_mouvements, categories)

GET /api/grades/programme/{grade_id}.details: Returns detailed grade info including techniques, mouvements, objectifs, criteres_evaluation, techniques_par_categorie, techniques_par_attaque

GET /api/grades/categories.details: Returns 8 technique categories (tachi_waza, suwari_waza, hanmi_handachi, ushiro_waza, tanto_dori, jo_dori, tachi_dori, jiyu_waza)

GET /api/grades/attaques.details: Returns attack types with Japanese names and descriptions

navigation_to_passages_grades.path: Administration > Espace de gestion > Sports > Aikido > Passages de Grades

screenshots: .screenshots/pg_01_passages_grades.png - Passages de Grades main view with grade list
